video.title: Flashpoint
video.synopsis: Sgt. Gregory Parker and his Strategic Response Unit tackle high-risk cases too tough for normal cops, including bomb scares and hostage situations.

episodes.synopsis: When an enraged gunman takes a hostage in a public square, the team must take drastic action and deal with the consequences.
episodes.title: Scorpio

episodes.synopsis: A desperate father turns a policeman's gun on a surgical team, demanding a heart transplant for his dying daughter.
episodes.title: First in Line

episodes.synopsis: A reformed drug addict visits a dealer who owes him money, unwittingly putting his life at risk in the middle of an SRU takedown.
episodes.title: Element of Surprise

episodes.synopsis: The SRU pulls out all the stops to rescue a cop taken hostage on his boat, but soon learn that the captor is his battered wife's older sister.
episodes.title: Asking for Flowers

episodes.synopsis: A bank robber tests Sgt. Parker's negotiating skills, while the team scrambles to determine what the criminal wants before he kills his hostage.
episodes.title: Who's George?

episodes.synopsis: A shooting at a mall brings the SRU into a situation involving a gang, retribution and a girl who's trying to make it against the odds.
episodes.title: Attention Shoppers

episodes.synopsis: SRU responds to shots fired in a home where they find a well-connected lawyer shot, and the rest of the family protecting the shooter.
episodes.title: He Knows His Brother

episodes.synopsis: Ed inserts himself into an incident at the courthouse when a parolee demands to see his prosecutor at gunpoint.
episodes.title: Never Kissed a Girl

episodes.synopsis: While trying to rescue an abducted girl, SRU finds another kidnappee and Jules must connect with her in order to save everyone.
episodes.title: Planets Aligned

episodes.synopsis: The team's easy assignment turns complex when the wife of the VIP they're protecting is rigged with a bomb.
episodes.title: Eagle Two

episodes.synopsis: Parker puts himself in charge of tactical and Sam as negotiator after a wife takes a woman hostage, believing she's had an affair with her husband.
episodes.title: Backwards Day

episodes.synopsis: The SRU is split between two crises as a bomb endangers a train station, and one of their own takes headquarters hostage.
episodes.title: Haunting the Barn

episodes.synopsis: SRU takes on a man trained in urban warfare who will stop at nothing to get revenge, endangering the team members as they try to flush out the sniper.
episodes.title: Between Heartbeats

episodes.synopsis: The team tests Jules's potential replacement and then is called to a scene where desperate men have taken an executive hostage to force an apology.
episodes.title: Business As Usual

episodes.synopsis: A robbery turns into a hostage situation, and Parker struggles to gain the trust of a nanny who may be more involved than he originally thought.
episodes.title: The Fortress

episodes.synopsis: SRU transfers a serial killer being flown in from another country, but the job is beset by officials, a hostage situation and Donna's first kill shot.
episodes.title: Clean Hands

episodes.synopsis: When two desperate teenagers take hostages in a store, Parker uses a risky maneuver to reach one of them through the other.
episodes.title: Aisle 13

episodes.synopsis: After biological parents reclaim their baby from the adoptive family, Parker will end up bargaining for the baby's life, and the father's as well.
episodes.title: The Perfect Family

episodes.synopsis: A hostage turns hostage-taker when his pregnant wife is used to force him to rob a bank. Jules's return puts Donna's future with SRU in question.
episodes.title: Remote Control

episodes.synopsis: A bullied teenager goes on a rampage at his high school. The team hopes to talk him down, but a family member compromises the rescue plan.
episodes.title: Perfect Storm

episodes.synopsis: The unit faces ethical decisions when they engage a couple who've taken a wedding party hostage so that the woman's last request can be fulfilled.
episodes.title: Last Dance

episodes.synopsis: The team sweeps a hospital floor by floor as they try to keep two brothers safe from gang members trying to silence them.
episodes.title: Exit Wounds

episodes.synopsis: Serial bombs set by an ecoterrorist strain the team's resources and endanger one of the members' lives.
episodes.title: One Wrong Move

episodes.synopsis: When a man kidnaps a waitress, the SRU team uses a different tactic to talk him out of hurting her. A woman joins the unit after a member's death.
episodes.title: Change of Address

episodes.synopsis: Anton Brand's fourth parole hearing fails after the board hears testimony from the daughter of a shopkeeper he killed during his holdup as a teenager.
episodes.title: Just a Man

episodes.synopsis: Adam Westfall is held at gunpoint by Donald Mitchell, who thinks Westfall's client Helen is helped by the lawyer's assistant to commit a kidnapping.
episodes.title: Custody

episodes.synopsis: Team One must locate and rescue a politician before a vengeful radio shock jock kills him on the air.
episodes.title: Coming to You Live

episodes.synopsis: A hostage crisis at a gas station becomes urgent when the hostage-taker reveals that a cult leader is about to kill his followers at his compound.
episodes.title: The Farm

episodes.synopsis: A case of mistaken identity could end badly when Parker's kidnapped by meth dealers who think he's someone else and the team must try to save him.
episodes.title: You Think You Know Someone

episodes.synopsis: When drug dealers vandalize a local man's bar, he takes matters into his own hands, and the SRU team are concerned about his retaliatory methods .
episodes.title: The Good Citizen

episodes.synopsis: The SRU team is called in to stop a sniper who's been setting booby traps and shooting citizens near a city landmark set to be demolished.
episodes.title: Behind the Blue Line

episodes.synopsis: Team One is called to a gun-buy-gone-wrong, only to discover the team is in pursuit of a psychopath in the making.
episodes.title: Unconditional Love

episodes.synopsis: Multiple child abductions lead the team to a distraught mother who will stop at nothing to put her family back together.
episodes.title: Severed Ties

episodes.synopsis: Following the interception of a white supremacist compound, the team discovers they have a bigger problem -- multiple bomb targets across the city.
episodes.title: Follow the Leader

episodes.synopsis: The SRU team wonder why a high school athlete who's been kidnapped and beaten would threaten suicide during their rescue attempt.
episodes.title: Whatever It Takes

episodes.synopsis: While the team tries to stop some gunrunners, they make a surprise discovery. Has a suspended cop gone bad, or is this a chance to right a wrong?
episodes.title: The Other Lane

episodes.synopsis: When a 911 operator hears a shot on the other end of a call, the team investigates, arriving to find a woman's been shot and the caller's disappeared.
episodes.title: Jumping at Shadows

episodes.synopsis: The actions of the SRU team are called into question, especially those of Sgt. Parker, in the wake of a shooting spree inside a museum gala.
episodes.title: Acceptable Risk

episodes.synopsis: The Strategic Response Unit is called in when a man charged with killing his own baby escapes a prison transport and is on the run.
episodes.title: Collateral Damage

episodes.synopsis: The Strategic Response Unit steps in when a couple, whose young son is near death due to leukemia, takes desperate measures to save his life.
episodes.title: Thicker Than Blood

episodes.synopsis: While on a date, Jules steps into a hostage situation in progress at a restaurant. The SRU's are called in to take down the gunman.
episodes.title: Terror

episodes.synopsis: When gunmen prevent Team One from helping at a bus crash, Spike cannot believe that his former mentor might be involved.
episodes.title: No Promises

episodes.synopsis: The Strategic Response Unit attempts to take down a crime boss, but the plan backfires and the boss gets away.
episodes.title: I'd Do Anything

episodes.synopsis: An outsider is brought in to perform psychological testing on Team One, but fearing someone will be let go, they start to turn on each other.
episodes.title: Fault Lines

episodes.synopsis: As Team One races to track down Ed's shooter, they connect him to a drug kingpin who is using the shooter to import opium from Afghanistan.
episodes.title: Personal Effects

episodes.synopsis: When a cop who mistakenly shot and killed a young boy is declared innocent, Team One confronts a rioting crowd and the father.
episodes.title: Good Cop

episodes.synopsis: Team One goes up against a notorious serial robber who streams his robberies on the Internet.
episodes.title: Run, Jaime, Run

episodes.synopsis: The Strategic Response Unit is called when a mother and daughter are abducted, and the only clue they have could expose a dark family secret.
episodes.title: Through a Glass Darkly

episodes.synopsis: As a citywide drug bust takes place, Team One struggles with a team member's secret that could compromise their assignment and end Wordy's career.
episodes.title: The Better Man

episodes.synopsis: When Raf, a new recruit, joins Team One, he learns what it means to be a member of the Strategic Response Unit.
episodes.title: A Day in the Life

episodes.synopsis: Two bombs are set off while Sam, Spike and Raff are responding to a hot call at an office building, trapping them and nine civilians inside.
episodes.title: Shockwave

episodes.synopsis: Team One has an unusual case when a passenger jet is hijacked by a group demanding the release of a prisoner.
episodes.title: Grounded

episodes.synopsis: Team One responds to 911 call after a masked gunman threatens a group of teens and kidnaps one of them.
episodes.title: The War Within

episodes.synopsis: Team One thinks they have a simple case of robbery on their hands, but things get complicated when the victim sabotages the rescue.
episodes.title: Cost of Doing Business

episodes.synopsis: Team One is alerted to a situation in a bank where a woman who appears to be under duress is withdrawing all her money.
episodes.title: Wild Card

episodes.synopsis: Team One must try to prevent the people close to Donna from getting killed and make sure her emotions don't get in the way.
episodes.title: A New Life

episodes.synopsis: Team One must figure out how to get a Chinatown gang to release a local shop owner.
episodes.title: A Call to Arms

episodes.synopsis: Stadium security guard Gil Collins defies Sgt. Parker and risks his own life by taking a hostage situation into his own hands.
episodes.title: Day Game

episodes.synopsis: When Spike answers Sam's sister's desperate plea for help, he is forced to help two criminals steal evidence from the Metro Evidence Depot.
episodes.title: Blue on Blue

episodes.synopsis: Team One is called in to try to stop a conflict at a psychiatric hospital where a stabbing has just taken place.
episodes.title: Team Player

episodes.synopsis: Greg Parker immediately faces suspension from the team after keeping the relationship between two team members a secret.
episodes.title: Priority of Life

episodes.synopsis: A fire captain who feels nothing he does is good enough is given the chance to prove himself.
episodes.title: Slow Burn

episodes.synopsis: Team One searches for an armed and abusive man who has tracked down his ex-wife, demanding to know where their daughter is.
episodes.title: Broken Peace

episodes.synopsis: As Team One tries to rescue a kidnapped doctor, Sam realizes that being taken hostage may be the only way to save a child who needs medical attention.
episodes.title: No Kind of Life

episodes.synopsis: Team One believes they're stopping a robbery in progress, unaware that part of the teenage thieves' plan is to escape their cruel leader.
episodes.title: Run to Me

episodes.synopsis: Team One discovers that they need to institute new security measures after a hacker infiltrates their computer system.
episodes.title: Eyes In

episodes.synopsis: Team One's efforts to save the life of a kidnapped woman depend largely on the abductor's brother, who harbors a dark family secret.
episodes.title: Sons of the Father

episodes.synopsis: The team is called in when a bomb explodes at a children's party, killing the leader of a biker gang under investigation.
episodes.title: Below the Surface

episodes.synopsis: The team tries to help a young man with an amazing memory who's taken captive and forced to memorize the specifications for a "smart gun."
episodes.title: Forget Oblivion

episodes.synopsis: Jules and Sam can't decide whether to share their personal news with the team. Meanwhile, some former soldiers hijack an armored truck.
episodes.title: We Take Care of Our Own

episodes.synopsis: When Dean and Clark go on a ride-along, a shootout takes place at a drug den, where three cops are on an off-the-books mission.
episodes.title: Lawmen

episodes.synopsis: Team One confronts a man who's desperate to protect his deaf nephew and the only place the boy has ever felt safe.
episodes.title: A World of Their Own

episodes.synopsis: Team One is called in when an armed and emotionally disturbed man takes refuge on a ferry after kidnapping his neighbor's baby.
episodes.title: Fit for Duty

episodes.synopsis: The members of Team One face the most challenging call of their careers when a series of bombs tears the city apart.
episodes.title: Keep the Peace: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Team One continues the hunt for a bomber at large as the squad splits up to deal with multiple bomb threats in a city already plunged into chaos.
episodes.title: Keep the Peace: Part 2
